ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and those who draw out gently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who undo the bonds gently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the angels who gently release the souls of the believers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And who softly release the soul. (Of the believer)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And by those who gently draw out the souls of the blessed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and those that draw out violently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the angels who release with gentle release.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by those who draw [it] out gently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By those who gently draw out (the souls of the blessed);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By those (angels) who gently take out (the souls of the believers);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the drawers (the angels of death), gently drawing (the souls of the believers),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] those who remove with ease
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:2] by those that draw out, [by] the angels who draw out the souls of believers, gently;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By the meteors rushing) and it is also said that He is here swearing by the angels who busy the disbelievers with grief and anxiety; it is also said that this refers to the souls of the believers which hasten to come out of their bodies in order to go to the Garden.
